wikipedia_page.main: Alec Grieve (1864-1933) was a Dundee artist best known for his symbolist and landscape paintings. He was born in Dundee on 13th October 1864.

response: In 1887 he decided to give up on his work as an architect and try his hand as an illustrator in London, where he managed to get employment at the publishers Alexander Strachan & Co. John Duncan and fellow Dundee artist Alec Grieve (1864-1933) were also working in London at this time.
